page.title: 10OLIVERS ORCHARD
page.content: Olivers Orchard is owned by Mr.Rupert Knowles. He grows fruit: apples, pears, plums and cherries. Soft fruit: gooseberries, strawberries, raspberries, loganberries, blackberries, blackcurrants, redcurrants. 60% of the fruit is "Pick Your Own". The rest of the fruit goes to markets in London and Gateshead. Mr.Knowles looks after the Roman River Centre and helps to write the leaflets {TREASURE TROVE}In May 1983 a hoard of 6000 3rd century silver/bronze Roman coins were ploughed up. 1500 coins were declared treasure trove. The tractor driver and the owner of the land shared the reward. {BRICK KILN_}A kiln has been discovered in Olivers Spinney. Bricks were made in the 17th and 18th centuries. The bricks were used to build Olivers.
